result.reason: Feature request with strong community demand (14 comments, multiple votes) to add logoff capability for connection groups, potentially via WTSLogoffSession API or by enabling external tools to run on folder/group children.
result.approach: Implement group logoff by either (a) adding WTSLogoffSession P/Invoke for RDP sessions and a 'Logoff Group' context menu action that iterates children, or (b) enabling 'Run External Tool on Folder' (#1336) which provides a workaround. Option (b) is simpler and solves both this and other group-action requests. The WtsApi32 approach would require session ID tracking per connection.
